post.title: Meet EnerBank USA Recruiters on November 5th
post.content:
Give Your Job Search a Boost and Attend the MyWorkster Career Fair.

EnerBank is currently hiring for positions in Contractor Support, Loan Processing, Collections and Customer Service. (Learn more about the positions here.) To give applicants and interested persons an opportunity to learn more about EnerBank and the open positions, we will be attending the MyWorkster Career Fair on November 5th at the University of Utah.

The Career Fair is free to attend for all alumni of the University of Utah, Utah State University, Utah Valley University, Southern Utah University, Westminster College, Brigham Young, Weber State University, Dixie State University, Valparaiso University, University of Indiana, La Salle University, Dixie State, Tulane and Webster.

Register here.
